channel.title: UNDERTALE / DELTARUNE NEWSLETTER - UNOFFICIAL ARCHIVE
channel.description: An unofficial, fan-made archive of Fangamer's UNDERTALE & DELTARUNE newsletter.

item.title: NO LONGER MAINTAINED!
item.description: It seems there is now an official archive of the newsletter, and as such this RSS feed will no longer be updated.

item.title: ISSUE 4
item.description: It's Autumn! You know what that means...!

item.title: ISSUE 3
item.description: What's that...!? It sounds like... the SUN!?

item.title: ISSUE 2
item.description: Welcome to Spring! Can you believe it's already been three months?!

item.title: ISSUE 1
item.description: Welcome to the first seasonal UNDERTALE & DELTARUNE Newsletter!
